    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>

          <identifier>

            <entry>cahi1:data_78689</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="fr">Formation de roche sous l'océan</string>
            <string language="en">Rock formation beneath the ocean</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Felsenanordnung unter dem Ozean</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Formação de rocha abaixo do oceano</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Formazione rocciosa sotto l'oceano</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σχηματισμός βράχου κάτω από τον ωκεανό</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Formación de roca debajo del océano</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fr">Cette illustration montre les longues chaînes de  montagne sous l'océan faites de jeunes roches. Pendant que la  section de la croûte sur le fond sous-marin s'éloigne, le magma remplit l'intervalle et forme de nouvelles roches tandis qu'il refroidit.</string>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the long mountain ranges underneath the ocean made of young rocks. As the section of crust on the sea floor moves apart, magma fills the gap and forms new rocks as it cools down.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">dérive continentale</string>
            <string language="en">continental drift</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">mouvement de la croûte</string>
            <string language="en">crust movement</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">la terre</string>
            <string language="en">Earth</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">roche  plutonique</string>
            <string language="en">igneous rock</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">magma</string>
            <string language="en">magma</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">formation de roche</string>
            <string language="en">rock formation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">fond sous-marin</string>
            <string language="en">sea floor</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">plats  tectoniques</string>
            <string language="en">tectonic plates</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt die langen Gebirgsstrecken 
unter den Ozean, der von den jungen Felsen gebildet wird. 
Während das Kapitel der Kruste auf dem Meeresgrund trennt, 
füllt Magma den Abstand und neuen die Felsen der Formulare, während 
es unten abkühlt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra as escalas longas da 
montanha debaixo do oceano feito de rochas novas. Enquanto a 
seção da crosta no assoalho de mar coloca de lado, o magma enche a 
abertura e as rochas novas dos formulários enquanto esfria para 
baixo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra le gamme lunghe della
montagna sotto l'oceano fatto delle roccie giovani. Mentre la 
sezione della crosta sul pavimento di mare separa, il magma riempie lo
spacco e roccie delle forme le nuove mentre si raffredda.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει μακροχρόνιες σειρές 
βουνών κάτω από τον ωκεανό φιαγμένο από νέους βράχους. 
Καθώς το τμήμα της κρούστας στον πυθμένα θάλασσας κινείται
χώρια, το μάγμα καλύπτει το κενό και διαμορφώνει τους νέους 
βράχους καθώς δροσίζει κάτω.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra los rangos largos de la
montaña por debajo del océano hecho de rocas jóvenes. 
Mientras que la sección de la corteza en el suelo de mar 
separa, el magma llena el boquete y las rocas nuevas de las formas 
mientras que se refresca abajo.</string>
          </description>
